name: No, Seriously. The Sun is a Jerk
name_original: No, Seriously. The Sun is a Jerk
description:
Finished now.

Jump with Z. 

Move left and right with the corresponding arrow keys.

Title track is Pikachu4352's Super Mario Bros. 3: Grass Land (New Super Mario Bros. Remix). The sound effect on the title track also comes from Super Mario Bros. 3.

Music in the game comes from Last Ranker:

  • A Breeze Blowing Towards Tomorrow
  • Beyond This World of Woe
  • The Journey Without End
  • A Round Table Conference

Voice clips from bill wurtz

Sun sprite created by Omega on The Spriter's Resource

Laughter was from freesounds.
